text: Ministry of Sound is a British record label. It started out as a nightclub in London, but has since diversified into a multimedia entertainment business. In addition to the nightclub, it is an independent record label and worldwide events brand with a radio station and other media outlets. ==History== Since its launch in 1993, Ministry of Sound has been responsible for 70 million album sales worldwide, in addition to 40 UK number-one albums and 21 number- one singles. On 10 August 2016, it was announced that Ministry of Sound's A&R; business had been acquired by Sony Music. == References == Category:British record labels Category:1991 establishments in the United Kingdom
title: Ministry of Sound
